website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for ball games with multiple children. Simple fun.
pros: A textured grip and a size that's not overly large is perfect for little hands
Four brightly colored balls offer non-stop action, even if one rolls away
Excellent for developing motor skills and hand-eye coordination
cons: A handful of reports of ball size discrepancies
Included pump is a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Not 8.5 inch diameter....its only 7 3/4 inch.
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy an 8.5 inch ball at the store for my daughter but decided to see if it was less here. It was but these are noticeably smaller than the ones at the store. Those measure a little over 27 inch circumference which is 8.5 inches. These measure 24.50 inch (generously inflated) which is only 7 3/4 inch. It is a huge difference in size vs a true 8.5 inch ball. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: IG @hess_adventures

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 4th grade class to play with at recess. My kids play four square a lot, and they all fight over these balls vs. the regular kickballs the school lets us use. I have only added air to one of them since I bought them and the kids are pretty rough with them. Very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Operation Christmas Child shoeboxes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in my Operation Christmas Child boxes knowing that balls are a huge hit but I can't pack an inflated one! These were perfect. They fit in the box super well, I was able to find more pumps at Dollar Tree and put them in with the ones that didn't have a pump (sent the one that came with it in one of the boxes). They are very well made and I'm hoping that they are being enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: Basic playground balls. Comes with pump and two extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Basic playground balls. Comes with pump and two extra needles. Pump has a place to store a needle which is quite handy. One of four came with faulty valve. Seller replaced instantly with no hassle. the size varies a little based on how much air pressure you put in. Used for kick ball games.
customer_reviews.author: RBM

customer_reviews.title: The same size that is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I read a bunch of reviews saying these balls were smaller than advertised or different sizes. Simply false. You have to inflate them correctly. Everyone who said they are too small just didn’t pump them up enough.
customer_reviews.author: James McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Capable of 8.5”+
customer_reviews.text: These balls inflated very easily with the pump to 8+inches. I inflated mine to 10” each, using just one of the the THREE included nozzles for all four balls. I am saving the extra nozzles for air refills, as needed. Re: size: my hands are 7” fingertip to palm*.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plum

customer_reviews.title: 1 ball was smaller....
customer_reviews.text: Great playground balls purchased for our locale school's playground. The yellow ball was a good 1.5 inches smaller than the rest of them. I sent an email to the seller, with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Jandafern

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, awesome colors!
customer_reviews.text: These look like they will hold up well. Perfect size and the pump is an added extra. I love the colors and think they will bring a lot of joy to the kids I am sending them to. These will go into Operation Christmas Child shoe box donations for needy kids around the world. I am glad they came un-inflated because I need them to fit in a shoe box. I bought some extra pumps as each ball will go to a different child. They are super sturdy and just the right size, so glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Ginamari

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think.
customer_reviews.text: The ball quality is very good and they bounce well, however, they are not that big. They are much smaller than your average kickball and even a small person can handle them with one hand. When I measured them I feel that they are more of a 7 inch diameter when blown up. The kids did not like using them for kickball because they were too hard to handle, we will try them for dodge ball though but I am not sure if they will work out for that game either. I can't imagine them being used for 4 square even with much older kids, they are just too small.
customer_reviews.author: DianaA

customer_reviews.title: Great Balls for Outdoor Games
customer_reviews.text: The four colors are nice so each player in a game can easily identify their ball. The texture and strength of the balls is good quality. We play "tree ball" and "saucer ball" and other games with them. In tree ball they bounce of trees well and we play a number of kicks to strike a sequence of trees. In saucer ball we use circular snow sleds and the goal is to be the first to kick the ball so it lands in the saucer, similar to golf. They work wonderfully for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price! One ball for indoor use and three for outdoor use. Comes with a pump and extra needles to pump the ball. My daughter loves them and so does our doggo when they play together. His nails haven't popped the balls or anything. Awesome balls!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay inflated.
customer_reviews.text: I inflated one of the balls the first day they arrived which held for about 6 hours before it started leaking around the inflation hole. When I reinflated it it immediately went back to leaking and deflated. I have now inflated a second one being very careful to insert the inflation needle straight into the center of the inflation hole and now, less than 3 hours later it has already lost some of it's inflation. These balls all say they were part of batch S18 so maybe S18 was just a bad batch...?
customer_reviews.author: CireSnave

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can re inflate them
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can re inflate them. They are out in the TX heat and will lose their air, but they have lasted along time and have held up to my 3 year old grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncy balls for the kids
customer_reviews.text: They are not the exact same as the ones the kids have at school, but they are perfect for my family. They bounce great, easy to inflate, and the kids are enjoying them. Once inflated, they were/are of slightly different sizes (not by a lot) but they feel equally inflated but are slight variation. Not complaining, just was surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Great value but smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good balls for the money...for what I paid I was not expecting much but they are definitely a good deal. They are NOT 8.5 inch as stated but were around 6-7 inches when inflated. Great for games involving some type of throwing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great balls!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Colorful as the picture, easy to inflate and sturdy. Bought them for my sons birthday party and the kids (9 or so 10 year olds) threw them all over the park, climbed on them and fought over them and they withheld it all and he still has all 4. Great deal and just like a real dodgeball should be. I would get again if I actually had use for 4 more dodgeballs
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Landfill filler. Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.text: One ball had a hole in it and could never be filled. Another would fill but not hold air for long. The other two were non-usable after one weekend of light play. The quality was so lousy that my 8 year old (unprompted) said that I needed to send the balls back. Unfortunately I did not.
customer_reviews.author: cae4

customer_reviews.title: Great product, high quality and great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! The material is thick and durable. It comes with 4 balls (deflated), a pump and 3 stems. Super easy to inflate - in fact, my 5 year old and 2 1/2 year old inflated them all by themselves. They are 8.5” in diameter, so smaller than a standard kick ball/dodge ball. But perfect for kiddos. What a great value as well! Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: xpltrn

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 1 1/2 year old. He loves to kick and throw these. We got them as a good way to start teaching him colors, and overall I am pleased. We have had them well over a month now, and only 1 has popped, and even that was due to the fact that the dog got a hold of it. Good value
customer_reviews.author: radams

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t inflate- not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get this product to inflate to full size. Returned and spent more money for one good quality ball.
customer_reviews.author: Consuela

customer_reviews.title: Review from a 9-year-old user.
customer_reviews.text: Review from a 9-year-old user: These balls were absolutely awful. First, they aren't even round! You heard me, they aren't even round. Second, the pump is super tedious to use. Third, they are not as big as advertised. Don't be fooled, they are NOT 8.5". I could continue this list, but that would take forever, so DON'T BUY THESE, keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: kevin McBirdie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: These are great for dodgeball!!! This is my second time buying these balls. We bought a bunch of these and some smaller ones. They hold up well. Just be cared when filling them up. If your needle is dry, it can puncture the ball and make a hole. I suggest licking the pump needle and then pumping up the ball (if you don’t think that is gross😂).
customer_reviews.author: Mardi

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger children
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these 4 balls to teach Pre-K students how to play two-square. They have been great! They are lightweight, which is perfect for this age. They love the bright colors and can catch the balls easily. They might be a little too lightweight for older children.
customer_reviews.author: A and P

customer_reviews.title: Good quality balls!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two orders of balls for our non-profit program. They are very useful and are not that hard where someone may get hurt. These are perfect for dodge ball, kickball, and bridge ball. The colors are also very vibrant and pretty. They bounce very well and it was easy to inflate. The material is shiny and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahi

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors. Super sturdy. Great bounce. Textured for easy handling. I got these for my 2 grandkids as an end of the school year gift. I was amazed at the good quality at such a reasonable price. We immediately inflated all 4 with the included pump without any problem. Instant fun. They love them. I totally recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schissler

customer_reviews.title: 4 balls and a pump.
customer_reviews.text: These balls hold up where others fall flat. We were replacing a ball that deflated after a short time of use. Not these balls. Great value for the product. 4 balls and a pump. No way.
customer_reviews.author: COM3IT Solutions, LLC.

customer_reviews.title: bought for gaga ball, happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: They all inflated fine and held air. Very sturdy balls. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sakura

customer_reviews.title: Still not leaking or popped unlike those name brand rubber balls that leak in a few days
customer_reviews.text: Survived for a month and still using the first one. I had many many Voit and way too many mikasa balls not last even a few days without going flat. Almost gave up on this style of ball but my daughter loves 2 square and these are perfect and seem the most durable we’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have a free pump out of the deal ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have a free pump out of the deal here. I feel like these are made cheaply. Says May 2018 Made in China. Let's see how long it lasts. Haven't used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my grand kids ages 5,2,2. The pump worked great. You could split the package up and give as gifts to four kids. Mine are staying at my house for next time when we need some outdoor time.
customer_reviews.author: Bevy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific balls!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my ball crazy dog. She LOVES THEM! And, unlike other balls I've purchased for her in the past, she hasn't been able to pop any of these (and I don't think she will either). We love taking them to the dog park too. We'll kick them across the entire fenced area and she will run and chase them like crazy. Thanks for the hours, and hours, and hours of enjoyment she gets out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: The Kids Are Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Like other reviews, the balls are slightly smaller than advertised, but the kids don’t mind in the slightest. Colors are bright and wonderful, and the quality is top shelf. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Fun Colors for EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of colorful balls. Easy to pump with the included ball pump. Perfect size for lots of backyard fun. Durable with the exception of dogs with teeth ........... not much can be done with that. :) Highly recommend. Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: AZJENNIE13

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s my kid anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Pumped these up and blasted my 2 year old with them. Kid is TERRIBLE at dodging, and don’t even get me started on his catching skills.
customer_reviews.author: DugTucky

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Pin separated from pump in second ball (wont go back), ball wont hold air within a week.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Not filmsy, this is a stout ball you can kick, bounce, or throw. Well made - kids even float on them in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4-Square Balls
customer_reviews.text: Great for PT use at home and solid enough that even when the dogs got a hold of these one day they came out okay.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Smaller, But They Get the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: These are a good deal for what you get, however, keep in mind that this is not the size of a regulation size kickball (those are 10"). Also, these feel like cheaper rubber than some of the more expensive balls I've gotten in the past. Though, these held up during a heavy weekend of dodge ball with 80+ people!
customer_reviews.author: Macaroni

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The pump didn’t the exact peace at the top so I can pump the balls wasn’t able to use them still in box
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: buy one right away!
customer_reviews.text: definitely worth it. it came with a pump and it wasnt hard to get it inflated. my daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous SF

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: These don't pump the right size, they're very oblong not a good shape for playing with, very poor quality. Crappy product. Just buy balls at Fred Meyer, Costco, or somewhere like that if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Durable, takes a good hit.
customer_reviews.text: These take abuse well. Thick walled, good fill needle hole. Stretched a couple of them out to 10".
customer_reviews.author: Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. No complaints. Would buy again. Came with (3) air needles as well - which is great because it took my 6 year old about 10 seconds to break 1 while trying to "help" fill up one of the balls (but that is NOT a product issue......that's a 6 year old boy issue) (-: Looking forward to kickball games in the yard with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ball
customer_reviews.text: Perfect outdoor bouncy balls. Great bounce. Easy to inflate, love that it comes with a pump and extra needles.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D

customer_reviews.title: We Love These
customer_reviews.text: 3 BOYS IN THE HOUSE. AGES 1 to 9 AND WE ALL REALLY LOVE THESE. UOU DO HAVE TO PUMP THEM, but it comes with everything you need. Pump and needle.
customer_reviews.author: Cañada Tribe

customer_reviews.title: They are a little tougher then regulation but I'm using them for an elementary school so they'll get worn in quick all in all a
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with these because of how low the price was. They are decent quality and it's very convenient with the pump. They are a little tougher then regulation but I'm using them for an elementary school so they'll get worn in quick all in all a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Msamples

customer_reviews.title: These were a great price and colors are vibrant
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and kids are always losing the playground balls. These were a great price and colors are vibrant. They are good quality and have lasted my kids many days of play. I really appreciate that it comes with a pump too.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: School Dodge balls for sure
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing with these ball especially for dodgeball battles they're not too hard they're just right like the ones I play with when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: A New Breed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kids dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: Used them a few times for playing dodgeball. They work awesome, they are slightly lighter than official dodgeballs so they don't hurt as much when you get hit in the head, but are harder to throw far. They seem to stay mostly round.
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Balls are great size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets of the playground balls for a program at work. They are the perfect size and will be great for our people. 1 of the 8 balls would not stay inflated. Contacted the company and they responded immediately and are replacing without any hassle. Will definately order from this comoany again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality - easy to,inflate
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and ease of inflation.
customer_reviews.author: Glen and Pam

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a school, going on 9 months and counting and still in good shape! Others brands kept popping, these don't!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are way off.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have stated, the balls are all different sizes. Out of 4 balls, only one of ours was anything near 8.5". We decided to keep them because we can still get use out of them despite the size.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good sized rubber ball
customer_reviews.text: Good size for younger kids. Three year old can manage the ball. Solid rubber and easy to fill with included pump.
customer_reviews.author: Carol-n-Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My students love these for their kickball games at recess!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: great value but cheap material
customer_reviews.text: colors and variety are great, the material has a bad chemical smell right out of the box. balls were damaged in a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty balls
customer_reviews.text: Great size and being used by the grandchildren in the gaga ball court I think they will hold up for quite a while and the colors are very nice
customer_reviews.author: Norma G

customer_reviews.title: 4 flat balls, no pump
customer_reviews.text: This product states it comes with a pump. There was no pump.
customer_reviews.author: HLaValle

customer_reviews.title: however they do nicely for backyard playing
customer_reviews.text: These aren't as heavy as regular "school grade" kickballs, however they do nicely for backyard playing. Great price, however, two of the balls could not keep air. The pump broke soon after we bought these, but I'm not sure it was faulty product, or negligent kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Gallic

customer_reviews.title: Good for home
customer_reviews.text: They are okay one had a funny lump so it doesn't bounce right. Good for occasional use maybe not for everyday playground use.
customer_reviews.author: lil crafty mom

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Easy to inflate with the included air pump. Great bounce. Holds up well to kids and dogs
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Only thing wrong which isn’t THAT terribly bad, the balls aren’t a normal sized ball they are a bit on the small side! But other then that my son hasn’t complained and loves playing hand ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good size for toddlers to kick
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. The air pump is really easy to use. Similar to the balls used in dodge ball.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Easily punctured
customer_reviews.text: I loved the variety of colors and the convenience of having a hand pump included. But this product was purchased for very active 9 year old third graders. They puncture easily and cannot be repaired. Less competitive kids might enjoy these, but they don't stand up to the rigors of seriously active kids.
customer_reviews.author: Middle child

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to 8.5 inches
customer_reviews.text: the balls are nice in that they bounce well but we blew up all 4 of them to maximum capacity and not a single one of them was anywhere close to 8.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H. Berndt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I bought these so my bird would stop fighting over them.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for dodgeball for elementary school students! (Just remind them no head shots!!)
customer_reviews.author: Lizzied

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves balls!
customer_reviews.text: Came with their own pump that a five year old was able to use independently.
customer_reviews.author: kathy peebles

customer_reviews.title: Not all the same size
customer_reviews.text: Fairly pleased with the purchase. The balls are NOT all the same size. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these balls for my 1.5 yr old toddler who is obsessed with balls. These are perfect for playing at the park or playground. They are not too big for his little hands. They are great for tossing and kicking. Reasonably priced.....highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phenomonkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew love them because they are pretty much the same type that he gets to used at his school. It come with it's own air pump.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Good balls, durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect balls for all activities. I like how they come with a pump so you can make the balls small or large.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Durable material
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy plastic. Fun colors. Went to retail shop to buy ball after our dog popped one, ended up ordering these due to price. Much stronger than more expensive balls already inflated at store.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: teacher
customer_reviews.text: Good balls for Operation Christmas Child shoeboxes! Add dollar store pumps for the other ones in the box. Cool balls!!! love em
customer_reviews.author: Irene Mary

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are much smaller than the 8.5 inch diameter manufacturer says on the box. They are all under 8 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love these balls
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these balls! It's perfect that you get for different colors, as they can all then have there own color and know which on I there ball! I have memories of playing with balls like this in school during recess. Kids now are so lucky they can have them at home!
customer_reviews.author: nanabon

customer_reviews.title: this is definitely a great purchase. It is so nice not having our ...
customer_reviews.text: I had arrived at a friend's house with her kids playing 4 square with a basketball that hurt all of our hands. So I got on Amazon and ordered these for our kids. Though a bit smaller than the balls we used for 4 square at recess back in our day, this is definitely a great purchase. It is so nice not having our hands hurt when we play now.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Blaque

customer_reviews.title: The balls are a good size for children
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for elementary PE. The balls are a good size for children. They are very good for tossing, bouncing, and throwing. I plan on buying more for the school year. I won't recommend using them outside.
customer_reviews.author: Hope R.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok for Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute good price . Didn't hold air well. Boght as Xmas gift for 6 year old
customer_reviews.author: mysondiego

customer_reviews.title: These were one of the best presents received
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for grandsons' birthdays. Their mother said all their play balls had been destroyed through use. These were one of the best presents received.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size balls to play with dodge balls
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size balls to play with dodge balls, not too big and a little on the small side which is very nice. None of mine came cracked like the others have said and we have had them in the cold garage​ for a couple months and still seem to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Skillet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Fun colors. My preschoolers use on playground every day.
customer_reviews.author: Rportnana

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved them...said they were just like what they had at school.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great for Operation Christmas Child
customer_reviews.text: These work great if you are filling a shoebox for Samaritan's Purse Operation Christmas Child. One of the most requested items are soccer balls and playground balls. Since they come deflated, one will fit well inside a shoebox and still leave room for other items. You can get packs of the pumps as well since this set only comes with one.
customer_reviews.author: rstack

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We play dodge ball with family and friends. Easy to use for kids but most of the time 20+ grown men are throwing them. They hold up well. Easy to inflate and deflate for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lemon

customer_reviews.title: great for rugged play
customer_reviews.text: These are great balls, they kick, bounce, throw. They are just soft enough that our youngest grandson can catch them. Our yard looks like a year round Easter egg hunt when our grandsons play with these balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Recess Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My students love these balls for recess. Some use them to play a game of kickball, while others bounce them and play basketball style games. They hold air very well.
customer_reviews.author: dukelady26

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 4
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 of the four playground balls held air. My kids were disappointed. You get what you pay for. Chicom garbage!!
customer_reviews.author: John chisum

customer_reviews.title: Small but good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I realized. Overall great quality. My students love them.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves our playground balls. My kids love them for playing their version of handball. Several friends have asked where we purchased. Great price for a set of 4 with pump.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: First feel is fine and as we just got them. They feel slightly more plastic than rubbery. Haven't played yet so we'll see how they hold up...
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Fun worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a donation to our kids preschool and they absolutely love them
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old and neighbors love these. Big enough they don't go down the drains and so durable. They even fit my toddler basketball hoop which is perfect with all the kids each getting their own color no fighting 😃
customer_reviews.author: P.Griz

customer_reviews.title: They love them. Glad the pump is included because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandsons for Christmas. They love them. Glad the pump is included because the balls do seem to lose a tiny bit of air over time.
customer_reviews.author: G. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and convenient air pump included
customer_reviews.text: Good bargain for the quality especially with the included air pump
customer_reviews.author: GoodCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Grandma's happy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for 3 grand boys, They love them, haven't popped them even with the things they do with balls. Grandma's happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Pump worked just fine and came with extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as favors for my sons dodgeball party. These are great. Pump worked just fine and came with extra needles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only 3 balls can be inflated
customer_reviews.text: Overall the balls were what expected, except one of them has an issue with the valve, making it impossible for it to stay inflated. So unfortunately I only got 3 functioning balls.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lange

customer_reviews.title: Just junk
customer_reviews.text: Red ball didn't hold any air. Yellow ball deflated in 2 days. Waste of money. Unhappy children.
customer_reviews.author: Will B

customer_reviews.title: but they seem to be good quality as my boys haven’t managed to pop them ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were slightly larger, but they seem to be good quality as my boys haven’t managed to pop them yet.
customer_reviews.author: JS

product_meta.title: AppleRound 8.5 Inch Dodgeball Playground Balls, Pack of 4 Balls with 1 Pump, Official Size for Dodge Ball, Handball, Camps and Schools (1-Pack, 4 Balls 1 Pump)
feature_bullets: 1 pack includes 4 balls and 1 pump in a color box. Each ball has an 8.5’’ diameter and 250 grams weight, featuring textured no-slip grip. Balls are inflatable and delivered deflated.
Bright and vibrant Colors: 1 each of Red, Blue, Green & Yellow ball, presented in a color box. Ideal for during recess play and other group activities.

The ball is made from heavy composition PVC (Contains no US banned phthalates and heavy metal elements.). It is NOT a foam ball and comes without foam layer/padding. Conforms to the safety requirements of EU EN71, US CPSIA & ASTM F963 Standard. Safe to use.
Easy inflation & deflation: Insert the needle into the air hole for inflation; Insert the needle only without the barrel of the pump for deflation. No additional plug needed to close the air hole.
Seller Warranty: Should pump or ball faulty, please 'Contact Seller' directly (other than Amazon Customer Service) for a replacement or refund. Seller usually replies most emails in 12 hours.
